text: (bright music)

- Bad quality code is a
trillion dollar problem.

You can write a lot of
lines of code with AI,

but you cannot automatically
create Fortune 5000 software.

At Qodo, we believe that
if we solve code testing,
then, basically, we solve its software.
Qodo is a quality-first coding platform
that enables professional, busy teams

to code, review, and test
for complex software.
Companies are starting to understand
that their real bottlenecks
are around code review, code testing.
Our code embedding model is unique

and the best out there for
solving for complex code bases.

We have 1 million developers
installing our tools,

1 million pull requests
being reviewed every quarter,
50,000 tests being generated every day.
When you think about our clients
like Fortune 5000 companies,
they want Qodo platform to run
inside their virtual private cloud in AWS.
Fortunately, AWS make it very easy for us
to run our models on our client VPC.
At Qodo, we have four different models,

and we use NVIDIA H100
in order to train them.

We care a lot about quantization
and the Hopper architecture

and NVIDIA H100 enable us
to 10x the context links
and 3x style throughput.
NVIDIA and AWS are great partners

with their Inception program
and GenAI Accelerator program.
They open opportunities for us.
They understand our needs,
what we're trying to achieve right now,
and they help us be a better startup.

The second phase of Qodo
is moving from a platform

that is focused on code
review and code testing

to building the AI
developer for complex code.

I think we will see developers
taking a software world
into areas we could not imagine,
and Qodo is the milestone,
a critical stepping stone

towards the next generation
of code generation.
(bright music)
